pkgmetadata.longdescription: Linuxtrade is a lightweight curses-based program with all the cool features expected from a real-time stock market trading console: portfolios, real time quotes, charts with live updates, time and sales, fundamental and technical indicators, top ten and market movers, news articles, alerts, option chains, the Briefing.com In Play and Up/Downgrades lists, earnings, splits and quiet period calendars, and Level 2 market depth indications from the Archipelago and the Island ECN's.
